mapper.select:
SELECT orn.ordr_numbr_seq as ordr_numbr_seq , orn.ORDR_DAT as ordr_dat , c.custmr_nme as custmr_nme , orn.PAMNT_METHD as pamnt_methd , orn.RECV_METHD as recv_methd , ors.ORDR_STAT as ordr_stat
, sum(empsp.all_pric) as pricSum , count(orr.prodct_seq) as prodctCount , CONCAT(p.prodct_nme, ' ' ,orr.ordr_amont, '개 ') as firstProdctNme , ifnull(orn.cart_img1, '/resources/image/common/no_image.gif') as cart_img1 FROM ordr_num_tb orn JOIN custmr_tb c ON orn.custmr_seq = c.custmr_seq JOIN ordr_stat_tb ors ON orn.ORDR_STAT_SEQ = ors.ORDR_STAT_SEQ JOIN ordr_recrd_tb orr ON orn.ordr_numbr_seq = orr.ordr_numbr_seq JOIN prodct_tb p ON orr.prodct_seq = p.prodct_seq JOIN emp_shipng_tb empsp ON empsp.ordr_numbr_seq = orn.ordr_numbr_seq WHERE DATE_FORMAT(orn.ORDR_DAT,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND orn.ORDR_STAT_SEQ = '${ordrStatSeq}'
AND (orn.ORDR_STAT_SEQ = 1 OR orn.ORDR_STAT_SEQ = 4)
GROUP BY orn.ordr_numbr_seq order by orn.ordr_numbr_seq desc;

SELECT orn.ordr_numbr_seq as ordr_numbr_seq , ifnull(orn.CART_IMG1, '/resources/image/common/no_image.gif') as cart_img1 , ifnull(orn.CART_IMG2, '/resources/image/common/no_image.gif') as cart_img2 , ifnull(orn.CART_IMG3, '/resources/image/common/no_image.gif') as cart_img3 , c.custmr_nme as custmr_nme , c.custmr_mobl as custmr_mobl , orn.recvr_nme as recvr_nme , orn.RECVR_mobl as recvr_mobl , orn.RECVR_POSTCD as recvr_postcd , orn.RECVR_ADDRSS as recvr_addrss , orn.RECVR_DETL_ADDRSS as recvr_detl_address , orn.ORDR_DAT as ordr_dat , orn.HOP_DELVR_DAT as hop_delvr_dat , orn.HOP_DELVR_TIM as hop_delvr_tim , orn.PAMNT_METHD as pamnt_methd , orn.RECV_METHD as recv_methd , ors.ORDR_STAT as ordr_stat , e.nme as emp_nme , e.mobl as emp_mobl
, (SELECT sum(empsp.all_pric) as pricSum FROM emp_shipng_tb empsp where empsp.ordr_numbr_seq = #{ordrNumbrSeq} group by empsp.ordr_numbr_seq ) as pricSum , ifnull(e.img_rot, '/resources/image/common/no_image.gif') as empImg
FROM ordr_num_tb orn JOIN custmr_tb c ON orn.custmr_seq = c.custmr_seq JOIN ordr_stat_tb ors ON orn.ORDR_STAT_SEQ = ors.ORDR_STAT_SEQ left JOIN emp_tb e ON orn.emp_seq = e.emp_seq left JOIN ordr_recrd_tb orr ON orn.ordr_numbr_seq = orr.ordr_numbr_seq WHERE orn.ordr_numbr_seq = #{ordrNumbrSeq} GROUP BY orn.ordr_numbr_seq

SELECT p.prodct_nme as prodct_nme ,o.ordr_amont as ordr_amont , o.sel_pric as sel_pric , o.ordr_amont as ordr_amont , o.sel_pric * o.ordr_amont as pricSum FROM (SELECT ordr_numbr_seq ,prodct_seq ,ordr_amont ,sel_pric AS sel_pric FROM ordr_recrd_tb UNION ALL SELECT ordr_numbr_seq ,pb.prodct_seq ,ordr_amont ,p.sel_pric FROM packg_ordr_desc_tb po JOIN packg_bridg_tb pb ON pb.packg_seq = po.packg_seq JOIN prodct_tb p ON p.prodct_seq = pb.prodct_seq ) o JOIN prodct_tb p ON o.prodct_seq = p.prodct_seq WHERE ordr_numbr_seq = #{ordrNumbrSeq};

SELECT orn.ordr_numbr_seq as ordr_numbr_seq , c.custmr_nme as custmr_nme , orn.ORDR_DAT as ordr_dat , orn.HOP_DELVR_DAT as hop_delvr_dat , orn.HOP_DELVR_TIM as hop_delvr_tim , orn.PAMNT_METHD as pamnt_methd , orn.RECV_METHD as recv_methd , ors.ORDR_STAT as ordr_stat FROM ordr_num_tb orn JOIN custmr_tb c ON orn.custmr_seq = c.custmr_seq JOIN ordr_stat_tb ors ON orn.ORDR_STAT_SEQ = ors.ORDR_STAT_SEQ
AND orn.recv_methd = '${ordrSechRecvMethd}'
AND orn.pamnt_methd = '${ordrSechPamntMethd}'
AND c.custmr_nme like '%${ordrSechText}%'
AND orn.ORDR_STAT_SEQ = '${ordrStatSeq}'
AND orn.ORDR_STAT_SEQ NOT IN (4)
ORDER BY orn.ordr_stat_seq, ordr_dat desc LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstRecordIndex};

SELECT count(*) FROM ordr_num_tb orn JOIN custmr_tb c ON orn.custmr_seq = c.custmr_seq
WHERE orn.ORDR_STAT_SEQ NOT IN (4)
WHERE orn.ORDR_STAT_SEQ = '${ordrStatSeq}'
AND orn.recv_methd = '${ordrSechRecvMethd}'
AND orn.pamnt_methd = '${ordrSechPamntMethd}'
AND c.custmr_nme like '%${ordrSechText}%'
